imdb.plot outline: See if you have what it takes to build a kit car from the ground up. KIT will present four different style car builds from four different build teams. This new series on SPEED will introduce viewers to the kit culture from clubs to car shows. Exotics, roadsters, hot rods and more - KIT explores how you can build your very own champagne street machine on a beer budget.
imdb.title: Kit: An Autobody Experience
plot: See if you have what it takes to build a kit car from the ground up. KIT will present four different style car builds from four different build teams.
